name: Weapon Warehouse
description:
You are Pork, the main Orc Grunt at a new store offering mail order weaponry for todays Medieval man.

Your job is to stop the warehouse from running out of space and getting overcrowded by shipping out as many orders as you can within the time limit.

Controls: 

Movement: WASD

 Pickup / Put down: E

 Ship Current Cart load: Space bar

Ludum dare 42 submission link:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/$10028700287
